system_description: ContosoShop – React SPA front-end with REST API in Azure App Service + SQL back-end + Service Bus for transaction decoupling.
issue_summary: Checkout process intermittently fails with 'Payment could not be processed' error.

conversation_history.message: We're seeing a surge in failed checkouts—customers are getting an error saying 'Payment could not be processed.' This started about an hour ago. We need urgent help.
Thank you for reporting this issue, Jordan. Can you confirm if all payment methods are affected, and whether the failures are consistent or intermittent?
It seems to be affecting all payment types, but not every transaction fails—maybe half go through, half return the error.
Understood. We're escalating this as a critical case and beginning our investigation. We'll update you as soon as we have findings.
